title: Higher Mathematics Education Continuity Strategies for Pandemic Response

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education experience and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Requires smartphone-based learning support in limited internet access environments, with flexible instructional design applicable to practical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously operate blended (offline/online) learning modules on an LMS platform within 4 weeks
Participants achieve an 80%+ assignment submission rate under unstable network conditions by the end of the 6-month course
Certified learners can develop and evaluate mathematics education continuity plans in hybrid digital-offline environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
